content.question: The third sentence of the first paragraph (“The continent...alone”) advances the author’s purpose by presenting characteristics and features that

choices.label: describe England in the seventeenth century
help define the idea presented in the previous sentence
challenge John Donne’s knowledge of the United States
help justify the claim made in the first sentence of the paragraph

content.answer: help define the idea presented in the previous sentence

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
